body_html: @yangqie I think it is still too early to say an official release for windows is coming, but they are trying. peterjc123 submitted many PRs for windows support and one of them has been merged. Some of them cannot pass the build, possibly because of dependency to other PRs. And possibly because of time passing, some of them now have conflicts. Support and patience are required, I think.

body: @yangqie I think it is still too early to say an official release for windows is coming, but they are trying. peterjc123 submitted many PRs for windows support and one of them has been merged. Some of them cannot pass the build, possibly because of dependency to other PRs. And possibly because of time passing, some of them now have conflicts. Support and patience are required, I think.
